Wire Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Attach ProbeAttaches a probe to the wire and returns a VI reference to the probe. Details
Clean Up WireCleans up the wire so that it has no loose ends, no hidden wire, and few bends and branches. Details
Copy Probes To CompanionCopies the probes from the simulation diagram to the companion diagram. Details
Delete JointRemoves the joint closest to Point. Details
Disconnect TerminalDisconnects a terminal from the wire without removing the loose end. Details
Insert NodeInserts a new node into the wire and returns a reference to the node. Use only Style or Path to specify the new node, not both. Details
Remove Loose EndsRemoves the loose ends of a wire. Details
Remove ProbeRemoves any probe attached to the wire. Details
